Growth (https://alphagrowth.fun/)","custom:security-contact":"security@euler.xyz","details":"Hook mechanics (from EVault Base.sol invokeHookTarget):      The vault appends the original caller address as 20 bytes to msg.data and calls      the hook target. BaseHookTarget._msgSender() extracts this caller from calldata.      If the hook reverts, the vault operation is blocked.      Hooks fire BEFORE the operation executes, so balanceOf reflects pre-op state.This hook is attached ONLY to the sUSDe borrow vault (hookedOps = OP_BORROW = 64).      Collateral vault withdraw/deposit protections are handled by _withdraw/_deposit overrides      in ERC4626EVCCollateralCork, not by this hook.Invariant enforced (on borrow):      - Account must have vbUSDC vault shares > 0      - Account must have cST vault shares > 0      - cST shares must be >= vbUSDC shares normalized (cstShares >= refShares * 1e12)        i.e., for every 1 vbUSDC (6 dec, 1e6 units), must have >= 1 cST (18 dec, 1e18 units)      - cST must not be expired","kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_borrowVault":"The sUSDe borrow vault.","_cstExpiry":"Unix timestamp of cST expiry (1776686400 = April 19, 2026).","_cstToken":"The raw cST token.","_cstVault":"The cST collateral vault.","_eVaultFactory":"The EVault factory (for BaseHookTarget.isProxy check).","_evc":"The EVC address.","_refVault":"The vbUSDC collateral vault."}},"isHookTarget()":{"details":"This function returns the expected magic value only if the caller is a proxy deployed by the recognized EVault factory.","returns":{"_0":"The bytes4 magic value (0x87439e04) that is the selector of this function"}}},"title":"ProtectedLoopHook","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"borrowVault()":{"notice":"The sUSDe borrow vault address (standard EVK)."},"cstExpiry()":{"notice":"Unix timestamp when cST expires. After this, borrowing is blocked."},"cstToken()":{"notice":"The raw cST token address (for expiry check)."},"cstVault()":{"notice":"The cST ERC4626EVCCollateralCork vault address."},"eVaultFactory()":{"notice":"The EVault factory contract."},"evc()":{"notice":"The EVC address, used to verify EVC context if needed."},"isHookTarget()":{"notice":"If given contract is a hook target, it is expected to return the bytes4 magic value that is the selector of this function"},"refVault()":{"notice":"The vbUSDC ERC4626EVCCollateralCork vault address."}},"notice":"Enforces vbUSDC + cST pairing invariants for Cork Protected Loop vaults.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/hook/ProtectedLoopHook.sol":"ProtectedLoopHook"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":20000},"remappings":[":@layerzerolabs/lz-evm-messagelib-v2/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/layerzero-v2/packages/layerzero-v2/evm/messagelib/",":@layerzerolabs/lz-evm-oapp-v2/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/layerzero-v2/packages/layerzero-v2/evm/oapp/",":@layerzerolabs/lz-evm-protocol-v2/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/layerzero-v2/packages/layerzero-v2/evm/protocol/",":@layerzerolabs/oapp-evm-upgradeable/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/layerzero-devtools/packages/oapp-evm-upgradeable/",":@layerzerolabs/oapp-evm/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/layerzero-devtools/packages/oapp-evm/",":@layerzerolabs/oft-evm/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/layerzero-devtools/packages/oft-evm/",":@openzeppelin/contracts/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":@pendle/core-v2/=lib/euler-price-oracle/lib/pendle-core-v2-public/contracts/",":@pyth/=lib/euler-price-oracle/lib/pyth-sdk-solidity/",":@redstone/evm-connector/=lib/euler-price-oracle/lib/redstone-oracles-monorepo/packages/evm-connector/contracts/",":@solady/=lib/euler-price-oracle/lib/solady/src/",":@uniswap/v3-core/=lib/euler-price-oracle/lib/v3-core/",":@uniswap/v3-periphery/=lib/euler-price-oracle/lib/v3-periphery/",":ds-test/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/euler-vault-kit/lib/ethereum-vault-connector/lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/euler-earn/lib/erc4626-tests/",":ethereum-vault-connector/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/ethereum-vault-connector/src/",":euler-earn/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/euler-earn/src/",":euler-price-oracle-test/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/euler-price-oracle/test/",":euler-price-oracle/=lib/euler-price-oracle/src/",":euler-vault-kit/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/euler-vault-kit/",":evc/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/ethereum-vault-connector/src/",":evk-periphery/=lib/evk-periphery/src/",":evk-test/=lib/evk-periphery/lib/euler-vau params._cstExpiry: Unix timestamp of cST expiry (1776686400 = April 19, 2026).

isHookTarget().details: This function returns the expected magic value only if the caller is a proxy deployed by the recognized EVault factory.

returns._0: The bytes4 magic value (0x87439e04) that is the selector of this function

borrowVault().notice: The sUSDe borrow vault address (standard EVK).

cstExpiry().notice: Unix timestamp when cST expires. After this, borrowing is blocked.

cstToken().notice: The raw cST token address (for expiry check).

evc().notice: The EVC address, used to verify EVC context if needed.

isHookTarget().notice: If given contract is a hook target, it is expected to return the bytes4 magic value that is the selector of this function
